Commands.Banishing Blade: Melee BRV attack + HP attackTarget: High chance 3 turns INT BRV Down I
Commands.Purgatory: 2-hit melee BRV attackTarget: Low chance 2 turns Melee Resist Down
Commands.Dragon Fang: 2-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attackHP damage sharedTarget: 1 turn delay; 3 turns Melee Resist DownSelf: 6 turns PHY ATK Up II

Artifacts.BRV Initiative: Raises Speed by 5% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Debuff Attack Up: Raises Attack by 5% while an enemy is debuffed.
Artifacts.Mighty Banishing Blade: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Banishing Blade by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Purgatory: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Purgatory by 10%.

Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Banishing Blade Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Banishing Blade.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Purgatory Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Purgatory.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Banishing Blade Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Banishing Blade.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Purgatory Charge: Increases the max uses of Purgatory by 1.
Passives.Pioneer's Spirit: Moderately raises Speed for 1 turn when the battle starts.

Weapons.Shimmering Blade: Increases Banishing Blade's potency.Raises the success rate of Initial BRV Down and increases its potency.Grants Small Max BRV Down for 3 turns.
Weapons.Chaos Blade: Increases the potency of Purgatory and raises the success rate of Melee Resistance Down.Grants Medium Speed Up for 4 turns.
